data.name: Gloomy Juncture
data.detailed_description:
Gloomy Juncture is the tale of a mundane person about to meet his fate in a peculiar world. A first-person hand-drawn adventure with items to collect, notes to take, riddles to decipher and environmental puzzles to solve.

Key Features:
  • Puzzles and Riddles - push levers and buttons, talk to NPCs, and explore the environment to gather notes and solve classic puzzles and riddles
  • Environmental Puzzles - figure out creative environmental puzzles by exploring the surroundings in detail
  • Voice Acting - the entire game features voice acted dialogue and voice overs
  • Dynamic Narration and Events - the main 'hero' narrates and comments on the game along the way, specific events and narrations are dynamic and triggered by the player decisions and interactions
  • Narrative Driven Gameplay - with cinematic influences while establishing a gameplay style that still pays homage to the classic point & click games from the 90s
  • Cinematic Influences - inspired by neo-noir films and psychological dramas, twisted in a kinky direction by blending classical horror and B-movies
  • Hand-Drawn - entirely hand-drawn with design influences from the early 3D games and N64 era. You'll be craving to see the next level


A gunshot set the threads in motion. You take the role of a mundane person with a simple life, but the consequences of the shooting are on a collision course with your fate until the curtain call. You need to make sense of the knowledge and solve puzzles in order to unveil the truth behind this intricate narrative. Who shot the gun? Who is the victim? Are you being driven to the edge of insanity?



The story-driven gameplay blends with the atmosphere of fatalism and hopelessness inspired by neo-noir films and psychological dramas (e.g., REQUIEM FOR A DREAM, VERTIGO, TAXI DRIVER, OLDBOY), but twisted in a kinky direction encompassing an aesthetic that blends classic european horror films with a dose of B-movies rawness (e.g., SUSPIRIA), featuring a sense of unease and obsession within a peculiar and sometimes feverish dream world.



The player follows an intricate narrative by exploring hand-drawn 3D sceneries and triggering dynamic narrations and events while interacting with the environment.
The gameplay also revolves around pushing levers and buttons, talking to NPCs with fully voice acted dialogs, taking notes and collecting items, dealing with logical puzzles, deciphering riddles and solving creative environmental puzzles by exploring the surroundings in detail.

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
